named-query.name: DocentenEntity.findByWeddeBetween
named-query.query: select d from DocentenEntity d where d.wedde between :van and :tot order by d.wedde, d.id

named-query.name: DocentenEntity.algemeneOpslag
named-query.query: UPDATE DocentenEntity d SET d.wedde = d.wedde * :factor

named-query.name: DocentenEntity.findByRijksRegisterNr
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM DocentenEntity d WHERE d.rijksRegisterNr = :rijksRegisterNr

named-query.name: Cursus.findByNaamContains
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CursusEntity c WHERE c.naam LIKE :zoals ORDER BY c.naam

named-query.name: CampussenEntity.findByGemeente
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CampussenEntity c WHERE c.adres.gemeente LIKE :gemeente ORDER BY c.naam

named-query.name: CampussenEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CampussenEntity c ORDER BY c.naam
